testsuite.name: SimpleBankSystemTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #3
The user should not be signed in after entering incorrect card information.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 1 Your card has been created Your card number: 4000003520477555
Your card PIN: 0808
1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 2 Enter your card number: > 4000003520477555 Enter your PIN: > 4310 You have successfully logged in! 1. Balance 2. Log out 0. Exit
